active-icon-class.description: The class name of the icon displayed when the switch is turned on, setting this item ignores 'active-text'
active-icon-class.description_zh: switch 打开时所显示图标的类名，设置此项会忽略 `active-text`

inactive-icon-class.description: The class name of the icon displayed when the switch is turned off, setting this will ignore 'inactive-text'
inactive-icon-class.description_zh: switch 关闭时所显示图标的类名，设置此项会忽略 `inactive-text`

active-text.description: Textual description when the switch is turned on
active-text.description_zh: switch 打开时的文字描述

inactive-text.description: A textual description when the switch is turned off
inactive-text.description_zh: switch 关闭时的文字描述

active-value.description: The value when the switch is on

inactive-value.description: The value when the switch is off

active-color.description: The background color of the switch when it is turned on

inactive-color.description: The background color when the switch is off

name.description_zh: switch 对应的 name 属性

validate-event.description: Whether to trigger the verification of the form when the switch state is changed
validate-event.description_zh: 改变 switch 状态时是否触发表单的校验

events.name: change
events.description: A callback function when the switch state changes
events.description_zh: switch 状态发生变化时的回调函数
